attributes.action: Remove Pakistan from the red list. There are no new variants in Pakistan.
attributes.additional_details: There are no new variants in Pakistan. Only the U.K. variant has spread in Pakistan which can be vaccinated for. People returning from Pakistan can isolate at home for 10 days instead of staying at a government hotel which most people cannot afford as they have already lost jobs to this pandemic. It is not fair that Pakistan and Bangladesh are in the red list, whereas India and other countries with high cases is not. Please remove Pakistan from the red list so people can come home.
attributes.background: Please remove Pakistan from the red list as there are no new variants. Other countries like France and India have more cases and they are not in the red list. Allow people to come home from Pakistan. Most people cannot afford to stay in government hotels for £1750.
